title: Strengthening Deep Learning Competencies in Practice: First-Person Perspective Video for Enhancing Basic Competencies of Emergency Medical Technicians

context.prior_knowledge: Basic first aid knowledge (CPR, hemorrhage control, etc.)
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can accurately describe standard treatment procedures for five core emergency scenarios (cardiac arrest, respiratory distress, severe bleeding, fractures, decreased consciousness) from a first-person perspective.
Learners can search for emergency skill videos using smartphones and QR codes and repeat learning them at least three times.
Learners can achieve over 85% accuracy in using emergency equipment (e.g., automated external defibrillators, airway maintenance devices) in summative assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
